{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/help": { "created": "20170615111129252", "text": "The [[top menu|$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/topmenu]] needs to be populated with tag based entries. The default top menu contains: ```
{{tagpill1||$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/menu-template}} {{tagpill2||$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/menu-template}}
``` Menu entries need to be tagged with the appropriate tags (in the example above:`tagpill1`, `tagpill2`) <<< ''Note:'' * The order of the menu entries can be changed by drag & drop * The color of the main menu items (tagpills) can be changed by adding a color field to the tags <<<", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/help", "tags": "", "modified": "20221227190851280" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/icon": { "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/icon", "modified": "20191230095735280", "created": "20160109210345621" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/license": { "created": "20180124185811291", "text": "[[Top menu plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20221227190409970" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/menu-template": { "text": " <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<> icon={{!!icon}} colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$button""" element-attributes="""popup=<> dragFilter='[all[current]tagging[]]' tag='span'"""/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down tgc-menu-drop-down"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TagDropdown]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<>/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/menu-template", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230095818405", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20150630194215349" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/readme": { "created": "20150701112855953", "text": "This plugin adds a top menu. The tiddler [[Top menu|$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/topmenu]] need to be populated with tag based top menu entries. For more information see my 'Top menu' guide at: http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''. ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20210103194647904", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/settings": { "created": "20160111185911104", "text": "!!Top menu settings @@.brown ''General''@@ <> @@.brown ''Top menu''@@ <> <> <> <> @@.brown ''Dropdown menu''@@ <> <> <> <> <>
<> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/settings", "tags": "$:/tags/plugin-tweaks", "order": "4", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221227191107018", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Top menu" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/settings-help": { "text": "|Item |Entry |Description |Default |h |General |Rounded corners |Main menu 'tagpills' and dropdown menu| 3px | ||||| |Top menu |Top 'Top menu' |Start (from the top) of the top menu| 0px | |~|Left 'Top menu' |Start (from the left) of the top menu | 42px | |~|Tagpill spacing |Spacing between main menu entries | 0px | |~|Font-size menu |Font size main menu | 1.2em | ||||| |Dropdown menu|Font size menu entries |Font-size of menu entries | 1em | |~|Background color menu |Background color dropdown menu | `<>` | |~|Color menu entries |Color menu entries | `<>` | |~|Hover color menu entry |Hover color menu entry | `<>` | |~|Hover background color menu entry |Hover background color menu entry | `<>` | <<< ''Note:''
@@.brown ''The color of the tag pills (= background color of the main menu entries) can be set by adding a color field to the tag.''@@ <<<", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/settings-help", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230100033151", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20150701110844646" }, "$:/plugins/tg/topmenu/styles": { "text": "
/* TOP MENU */
.tgc-topmenu {
     display: block;
     position: fixed;
     left: 0;
     top: 0px;
     margin-left: {{!!topmenu-left}};
     margin-top: {{!!topmenu-top}};
     font-size: {{!!menu-font-size}};
     z-index: 1500;
}

/* TOP MENU TAG PILL ENTRIES */
/* html needed */
html .tgc-topmenu .tc-tag-label {
     border-radius: {{!!border-radius}};
}

.tgc-menu-drop-down {
     min-width: 120px;
     background-color: {{!!menu-background-color}};
     padding: 10px 0px;
     border-radius: {{!!border-radius}};
     box-shadow: 2px 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
     font-size: {{!!menu-entry-font-size}};
text-decoration: none;
}

/* TAGS DROPDOWN LISTS */
.tc-tag-list-item .tc-drop-down a {
     color: {{!!menu-color}};
     font-size: {{!!menu-entry-font-size}};
}

.tc-tag-list-item .tc-drop-down a:hover {
     color: {{!!hover-color}};
background-color: {{!!hover-background-color}};
}

/* TAGPILL SPACING */
.tgc-topmenu .tc-tag-label {
     margin-right: {{!!tagpill-spacing}};
}
